hero.title: Why USA
hero.subtitle: World-class education with globally recognized degrees and unmatched opportunities
hero.description: Discover why the United States is the top destination for international students seeking excellence in education.

education.title: World-Class Education
education.description: The USA hosts the most globally recognized universities, offering cutting-edge programs, world-renowned faculty, and degrees valued by employers worldwide.

research.title: Research & Innovation
research.description: American universities lead in research and innovation, with access to state-of-the-art facilities, groundbreaking discoveries, and collaboration with industry leaders.

scholarship.title: Scholarship Opportunities
scholarship.description: Generous financial aid and scholarship programs are available for international students, including government-sponsored programs like Fulbright.

life.title: Quality of Life
life.description: Experience diverse landscapes, vibrant cities, safe campuses, and a high standard of living while pursuing your education in America.

opportunities.title: Career Opportunities
opportunities.description: OPT and CPT programs allow international students to gain valuable work experience. Many graduates build successful careers through H-1B visas.

culture.title: Cultural Diversity
culture.description: American campuses are melting pots of cultures from around the world. Build a global network and experience diverse perspectives.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Why choose to study in the USA

communityCollege.title: Community College (CC)
communityCollege.description: Start at a 2-year college and transfer to a 4-year university

languageProgram.title: Language Program
languageProgram.description: Improve English skills with ESL programs

vocationalTraining.title: Vocational Training
vocationalTraining.description: Certificate courses and career training programs

k12Observation.title: K-12 Observation
k12Observation.description: Experience American elementary and secondary education

stayDuration.title: Residence Eligibility & Stay Duration
stayDuration.description: Visa status and stay period management

employment.title: Employment in USA
employment.description: Job opportunities and procedures for students

stories.title: Study Abroad Stories
stories.description: Experiences from students who studied in USA

language.title: Language & Vocational
language.description: ESL programs, certificate courses, and vocational training for career advancement.

k12.description: Experience American elementary and secondary education through observation programs.

hero.title: Plan your studies
hero.subtitle: Not difficult at all.
hero.description: Prepare everything from school selection to visa application information in Korea.

educationSystem.title: Korea's Education System
educationSystem.desc: Korea's higher education system is divided into bachelor's, master's, and doctoral programs at universities and colleges. Language training programs are also available at university-affiliated institutions.

schoolType.title: School Types
schoolType.desc: If you're considering studying in Korea, check out various school information and programs.

certifiedUniversity.title: Certified Excellent Universities
certifiedUniversity.desc: Check out certified universities in Korea with high internationalization capacity.

examAndKorean.title: TOPIK & Korean Study
examAndKorean.desc: Learn about the Korean language proficiency test and ways to study Korean.

expenses.title: Study Expenses
expenses.desc: For successful study abroad life, you need to consider other expenses besides university tuition.

scholarship.title: Scholarships
scholarship.desc: Various scholarships are provided to support international students' study opportunities.

visa.title: Student Visa & Residence Status
visa.desc: Check the eligibility for each program and required documents for visa application.

flowChart.title: Application FlowChart
flowChart.desc: Learn in advance about the application process of the university you want to apply to.

onlineApplication.title: Online Application
onlineApplication.desc: Once you've decided to study abroad, you can easily apply online through Study in Korea.

guidebook.title: Guidebook
guidebook.desc: Get help through guidebooks from study preparation to study abroad life.

findSchool.title: Find Department & University
findSchool.desc: Search by university or major name to find school information of interest at a glance.

onlineKorean.title: Online Korean Learning
onlineKorean.desc: Refer to various online learning resources including Korean through Korean culture and practical Korean at King Sejong Institute.

gks.title: GKS Alumni Invitation Training
gks.desc: A precious opportunity that will open new possibilities for the future. The Korean government supports scholarships.

interview.title: International Student Interview
interview.desc: I came to study in Korea with a government scholarship. I spent very beneficial time in Korea.

opportunity.title: Opportunity to Study in Korea
opportunity.desc: Opportunities are provided to international students for undergraduate and graduate degree programs every year.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Begin your study abroad planning with us today
